sentences.en: A nematode worm ( Syngamus trachea ) that infects the tracheas of certain birds and causes gapes.

sentences.en: A NEW PARASITIC NEMATODE OF THE FAMILY HELIGMOSOMATIDAE CRAM , 1927 ( TRICHOSTRONGYLOIDEA )
sentences.cn: 绕体科寄生线虫一新种—— ( 毛圆目:绕体科 )

sentences.en: Arthrobotrys dactyloides, a species of nematode - trapping fungi, formed conidial trap induced with soils and cow dung.
sentences.cn: 利用牛粪、土壤等基质诱导捕食线虫真菌指状节丛孢产生孢子捕食器官.

sentences.en: Cereal cyst nematode was one of the nematodes harming Anyang city , especially often Anyang county.
sentences.cn: 禾谷孢囊线虫是危害禾谷类作物的病原线虫,培育和推广禾谷孢囊线虫抗性品种是最经济 、 安全、有效的防治途径.

sentences.en: Elephantiasis, or lymphatic filariasis, is a mosquito-borne disease caused by several types of nematode worm, including B. malayi.
sentences.cn: 象皮病（淋巴丝虫病）是一种蚊媒疾病，它是由包括马来丝虫在内的几种线虫导致的。

sentences.en: Even nematode worms can recognize parasitic bacteria in a petri dish and crawl the other away, Curtis said.
sentences.cn: 即使线虫类生物也能识别存在于有盖培养皿里的传染病毒，掉头离开。

sentences.en: In the new study, the Utah biologists used mutant nematode worms lacking beta spectrin.
sentences.cn: 在这项新的研究中, 犹他的生物学家们使用了缺失β-血影蛋白的突变线虫.

sentences.en: It is a large nematode (roundworm), Dracunculus medinensis, which is ingested through drinking contaminated water.
sentences.cn: 它是一种大的线虫（圆形虫），即麦地那龙线虫，通过饮用污染水进入人体。

sentences.en: Nematode damage to the soybean roots is characterized by coarse roots.
sentences.cn: 线虫破坏大豆根系的特征是:根系粗糙.

sentences.en: Pine wood nematode disease is a most devastating disease of pine trees.
sentences.cn: 松材线虫病是松树的一种毁灭性病害.

sentences.en: The measurements and morphological description of two population of this nematode were given.
sentences.cn: 对此线虫两个群体进行了形态学测量和描述。

sentences.en: The results showed that the hyphae of nematode trapping fungi branched radiantly on 0.
sentences.cn: 对捕食线虫性真菌菌丝、分生孢子、厚垣孢子、捕食性结构的发育过程和特点及其在0.

sentences.en: These Methods: Were essential to the study on classification, identification and characteristics of the plant nematode.
sentences.cn: 这些方法对植物寄生线虫的分类鉴定和侵染特性研究具有重要意义.

sentences.en: When the gene was disabled in tiny nematode worms, their nerve cells literally broke.
sentences.cn: 当很小的线虫体内的这种基因失去作用, 它们的神经细胞会完全断裂.

trans.tran_en: any unsegmented worm of the phylum (or class) Nematoda, having a tough outer cuticle
